MarvelKeyNotSaved: These keys are not saved in the application. They are temporarly saved in your browser while you are using the application.
MarvelJSDisclaimer: This application is not endorsed in any way by the Marvel company. It is a personal initiative with the sole purpose to learn and test new programming skills. It is an open source project, availalbe on GitHub. I use the Marvel API simply to join two of my passions: programming and comics. The is licensed under a MIT License, so basically you can do as you please with it, although a reference to the origin is always welcome. PromotionDescription: My company, TSolucio, and I are available for all sorts of programmming tasks and specillay for coreBOS implementations. Don't hesitat to contact us for whatever you need.
MarvelKeyNotSet: Marvel Keys are not set! You must set these here or in the setup.js file to be able to use the application. You can get a set of keys at Marvel Developer
MarvelAPIInvalidKeys: Marvel API Keys seem to be invalid as we are receiving a Not Authorized error response. Please review your values and make sure they are correct. You can get a set of keys at Marvel Developer
